title: What is a 500 percent increase? - Quora

response.answer_text: 500% increase actually means the value now becomes 600%,or 6 times of original value. Lets say now you want to see a 500% increase of the number 2. The number now becomes 12,as… 2+(500% of 2) =2+10 =12 To prove this,you know that 2 times 6 is actually 12.
It is x + 500% of x Example: What is a 500% increase of 4? 4 + 500%(4) = 4 + (500/100)(4) = 4 + 20 = 24
